sentences.sContent: Would you consider ping-pong an outdoor sport?
sentences.sContent_eng: Would you consider ping-pong an outdoor sport?
sentences.sCn: 你认为乒乓球是一项户外运动吗？

sentences.sContent: But it could also have another application: electron ping-pong.
sentences.sContent_eng: But it could also have another application: electron ping-pong.
sentences.sCn: 不过它也有另一项用途：电子乒乓球。

sentences.sContent: She is a great ping-pong player.
sentences.sCn: 她是一个优秀的乒乓球运动员。
